metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Theom data connector with template version 2.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Theom
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Theom Data Connector enables organizations to connect their Theom environment to Microsoft Sentinel. This solution enables users to receive alerts on data security risks, create and enrich incidents, check statistics and trigger SOAR playbooks in Microsoft Sentinel

sampleQueries.description: All alerts in the past 24 hour
sampleQueries.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
     | where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
  | sort by TimeGenerated
  | limit 10

dataTypes.name: TheomAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
TheomAlerts_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
  | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
TheomAlerts_CL
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
 | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(90d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description:
1. In **Theom UI Console** click on **Manage -> Alerts** on the side bar.
2. Select  **Sentinel** tab.
3. Click on **Active** button to enable the configuration.
4. Enter `Primary` key as `Authorization Token`
5. Enter `Endpoint URL` as `https://<Workspace ID>.ods.opinsights.azure.com/api/logs?api-version=2016-04-01`
6. Click on `SAVE SETTINGS`

instructionSteps.description:
1. In **Theom UI Console** click on **Manage -> Alerts** on the side bar.
2. Select  **Sentinel** tab.
3. Click on **Active** button to enable the configuration.
4. Enter `Primary` key as `Authorization Token`
5. Enter `Endpoint URL` as `https://<Workspace ID>.ods.opinsights.azure.com/api/logs?api-version=2016-04-01`
6. Click on `SAVE SETTINGS`

properties.description: @{workbookKey=TheomWorkbook; logoFileName=theom-logo.svg; description=Theom Alert Statistics; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Theom; templateRelativePath=Theom.json; subtitle=; provider=Theom}.description
TheomRisksCritical_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.0
Creates Microsoft Sentinel incidents for critical risk Theom alerts.
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
 | where priority_s == "P1"

properties.description: TheomRisksHigh_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.0
Creates Microsoft Sentinel incidents for high risk Theom alerts.
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
 | where priority_s == "P2"

properties.description: TheomRisksMedium_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.0
Creates Microsoft Sentinel incidents for medium risk Theom alerts.
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
 | where priority_s == "P3"

properties.description: TheomRisksLow_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.0
Creates Microsoft Sentinel incidents for low risk Theom alerts
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
 | where priority_s == "P4"

properties.description: TheomRisksInsights_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.0
Creates Microsoft Sentinel incidents for Theom insight alerts.
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
 | where priority_s == "P5"

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0001 (Developer secrets have been observed in unencrypted data stores. Encrypt data at rest to comply with this CIS requirement)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0001" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0002 (National IDs have been observed in unencrypted data stores. Encrypt data at rest to comply with this CIS requirement)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0002" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0003 (Financial data has been observed in unencrypted data stores. Encrypt data at rest to comply with this CIS requirement)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0003" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0004 (Healthcare data has been observed in unencrypted data stores. Encrypt data at rest to comply with this CIS requirement)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0004" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0005 (Theom has observed data stores that are both unencrypted and publicly accessible. Review if the data store and the data within should be publicly accessible. Additionally, encrypt the data at rest to comply with these CIS requirements)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0005" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId's TRIS0007 to TRIS0010 and TRIS0014
properties.displayName: Theom - Critical data in API headers or body
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where ( customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0007" or customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0008" or
    customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0009" or customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0010" or customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0014" )  
    and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0012 (Theom has observed developer secrets in a data store that is publicly exposed. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions to secure your data)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0012" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0015 (Theom has observed healthcare data in a data store that is publicly exposed. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions to secure your data)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0015" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0018 (Theom has observed National IDs in a data store that is publicly exposed. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions to secure your data)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0018" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0026 (Theom has observed financial data in a data store that is publicly exposed. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions to secure your data)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0026" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0032 (Theom has observed data with a large financial value, but that has not been accessed recently. Use this information to enforce data retention policies)
properties.displayName: Theom - Dark Data with large fin value
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0032" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0032 (Theom has observed shadow (or clone) databases/tables that have a large financial value. Additionally, it has observed roles that are overprovisioned for these data stores. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions and enforce data retention policies)
properties.displayName: Theom - Least priv large value shadow DB
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0032" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0034 (Theom has observed shadow (or clone) databases/tables. Additionally, it has observed roles that are overprovisioned for these data stores. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions and enforce data retention policies)
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0034" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0035 (Theom has observed shadow (or clone) databases/tables with large financial value. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions and enforce data retention policies)
properties.displayName: Theom - Shadow DB large datastore value
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0035" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")

properties.description: Creates Sentinel incidents for critical/high Theom risks, associated with ruleId TRIS0036 (Theom has observed shadow or clone databases/tables. Additionally, it has observed atypical accesses to these data stores. As per this requirement, use this information to apply data access control lists or access permissions and enforce data retention policies)
properties.displayName: Theom - Shadow DB with atypical accesses
properties.query:
TheomAlerts_CL
  | where customProps_RuleId_s == "TRIS0036" and (priority_s == "P1" or priority_s == "P2")
